amendatorysection.catchline: Sections, how construed with respect to liability.
amendatorysection.para: Nothing in sections 60-3301 to 60-3311 shall be construed to provide greater liability than is already allowed under the Political Subdivisions Tort Claims Act or the State Tort Claims Act.

crossreference.para: Political Subdivisions Tort Claims Act, see section 13-901.
State Tort Claims Act, see section 81-8,235.
